cab.content: IS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.)CRET*apjjOjTEJvIBERo 1942c,197COPY NOrWAR CABINET,AffPI-U-BOAT WARFARE,,Note by the Secretary of the War Cabinet*The Prime Minister has decided to hold a seriesof weekly meetings on Anti-U-Boat Warfare, on the linesof the meetings held on the Battle of the ^tlantie0These meetings will be regularly attended bythe followings-Tho Prime iii raster (In the Chair),-The Lord Privy Seal. (Deputy Chairman)0The First" Lord of the Admiralty0The Secretary of State for Air0The Minister of War Transport,,The First Sea LordoThe Chief of the Air StaffsMinisters will be free to bring other technical advisers according to the particular questions underdiscussion?For the present, meetings will be held regularlyat 6., 0 p0nu on Wednesdays6(Signed) E',Eo BRIDGES,Great George Street, S,W.l0
